articles.description: Aditi Rao Hydari's lehenga set is just perfect for your bridesmaid look.
articles.content: For her glam makeup, Aditi opted for nude eyeshadow, smudged eyeliner, mascaraed lashes, darkened brows, contoured cheekbones, blushed cheeks, luminous highlighter and a shade of matte pink lipstick.
